name: NAV
briefDescription: Network Administration Visualized, a free network management system
fullDescription: Network Administration Visualized is an advanced software suite to monitor large computer networks. It automatically discovers network topology, monitors network load and outages, and can send alerts on network events by e-mail and SMS, allowing for flexible configuration of alert profiles.

dockerComposeFileTemplate.composeFileTemplateContent:
version: '2'
services:
  ${nav.container_name}:
    image: mbrekkevold/nav:latest
    ports:
      - ${port}:80
    volumes:
      - ${volume}/log:/usr/local/nav/var/log
      - ${volume}/roomimages:/usr/local/nav/var/uploads/images/rooms
    depends_on:
      - postgres
      - carbon-cache
      - graphite-web
    environment:
      - PGHOST=postgres
      - PGDATABASE=nav
      - PGUSER=nav
      - PGPORT=5432
      - CARBONHOST=carbon-cache
      - CARBONPORT=2003
      - GRAPHITEWEB=http://graphite-web/
      - NOINITDB=0
    networks:
      nmaas-ext-access:
      nmaas-dcn:
        ipv4_address: ${nav.container_ip_address}
      nmaas-inter-container:
    privileged: true

  postgres:
    image: postgres:9.4
    volumes:
      - ${volume}/postgres:/var/lib/postgresql/data
    networks:
      nmaas-inter-container:

  carbon-cache:
    image: mbrekkevold/nav-carbon-cache:latest
    volumes_from:
      - whisper
    networks:
      nmaas-inter-container:

  graphite-web:
    image: mbrekkevold/graphite-web
    environment:
      - TIME_ZONE=Europe/Oslo
      - CARBONLINK_HOSTS=carbon-cache:7002
    volumes_from:
      - whisper
    networks:
      nmaas-inter-container:

  whisper:
    image: busybox
    volumes:
      - ${volume}/whisper:/var/lib/graphite/storage/whisper
    networks:
      nmaas-inter-container:

networks:
  nmaas-ext-access:
    external:
      name: ${nmaas_ext_access_network}
  nmaas-dcn:
    external:
      name: ${nmaas_dcn_network}
  nmaas-inter-container:

form.helpvalue: All required configuration should be applied using NAV graphical interface
